nodes.bodyText: Will this handle all errors? It looks like it just tests the one?

Yes, the code handles any type of error. This test demonstrates the end-to-end flow and validates that the error message is templated into the modal dialog. I don't think explicit tests for different error codes would be worth the redundancy.
Sorry, yes, I understood the feature, I was just nitpicking the text on the test. This seems fine then.
